actions.committee: Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to ensure that safety net family planning centers are eligible for assistance under the drug discount program.

summary.text: Affordable Care for Women Act - Amends the Public Health Service Act to expand the 340B drug pricing program to allow participation as a covered entity by a public or nonprofit entity that primarily provides family planning services.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to ensure that safety net family planning centers are eligible for assistance under the drug discount program.
